subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Camelot’s bid to become the first horse to win the English Triple Crown since 1970 was foiled when Encke, a 25-1 shot, won the St. Leger.
snippet: Camelot’s bid to become the first horse to win the English Triple Crown since 1970 was foiled when Encke, a 25-1 shot, won the St. Leger.
